acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle both native and wrapped short values with @PodamShortValue annotation
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleShortValuesWithThePodamShortValueAnnotation

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.ShortValuePojo

Then the Pojo ShortRangeValuesPojo ( shortFieldWithMinValueOnly = 0 shortFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 62 shortFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 68 shortObjectFieldWithMinValueOnly = 0 shortObjectFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 47 shortObjectFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 24 shortFieldWithPreciseValue = 17 ) should not be null
Then the value 0 should be greater or equal than 0
Then the short value 62 should be lower or equal than 100
Then the short value 68 should be between 0 and 1000
Then the Pojo 0 should not be null
Then the value 0 should be greater or equal than 0
Then the Pojo 62 should not be null
Then the short value 47 should be lower or equal than 100
Then the Pojo 24 should not be null
Then the short value 24 should be between 0 and 100
Then the short value 17 should be precisely 17
